Waves of increasing and decreasing peaks of #Bitcoin Realized Loss and Realized Profit (7 Day SMA).

Why 7 day SMA? It helps smooth out the data and eliminate some of the noise.

RL spikes as investors want out and RP spikes during profit taking on price increases. https://t.co/6r69ddz0M7
